text: A kimono is a Japanese traditional garment. Kimono may also refer to: ==Music== *kimono (band), an Icelandic-Canadian math rock band *Kimono Draggin', an American avant-garde Indie Rock band *Ras Kimono (1958–2018), Africa reggae artist ==Other uses== *Kimono, a character in the My Little Pony franchise *Kimono: Fashioning Culture, a 1993 book by American anthropologist Liza Dalby ==See also== *Anna Kimonos (born 1975)
title: Kimono (disambiguation)
